Title: Prohibits the erection or maintenance of billboards advertising alcoholic beverages within 1000 feet of schools or playgrounds
Summary: Prohibits the erection or maintenance of billboards advertising alcoholic beverages within 1000 feet of schools or playgrounds; defines "billboard".
LawCode: Add ยง397-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to billboards advertising alcoholic beverages
